DOC.brief_summary: Iron deficiency problem always Taiwan . This randomized , double-blind trial . Subjects separate 3 group , one group ( n = 20 ) take two Natureheme-iron capsule day total 12 week , another group ( n = 20 ) dose placebo , group ( n = 20 ) commercial iron supplement . We assess whether Natureheme-iron promote iron absorption antioxidant effect , compare effect commercial iron supplement . When study complete , increase value Natureheme-iron , improve health Taiwanese .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Natureheme-iron Iron Absorption Effect Anti-oxidation Functions
DOC.detailed_description: FAO / WHO note iron deficiency still important nutritional problem . Iron deficiency problem always Taiwan . This study intend use product , Natureheme-iron , use blood pig concentration , separation extract , get natural clean Natureheme-iron . Natureheme-iron good iron supplement , also provide excellent source natural protein . This randomized , double-blind trial , subject separate 3 group , one group ( n = 20 ) take two Natureheme-iron capsule day total 12 week ( 1000mg Fe / capsule ) , another group ( n = 20 ) dose placebo , group ( n = 20 ) commercial iron supplement ( 100mg Fe ) . We assess whether Natureheme-iron promote iron absorption antioxidant effect , compare effect commercial iron supplement . When study complete , increase value Natureheme-iron , improve health Taiwanese .
DOC.criteria: Eligible subject anemia men woman age 20 year old Hb < =12 g/dl . Subjects exclude history major cardiovascular disease , severe liver dysfunction , insulindependent diabetes mellitus stroke . They also exclude routinely consume alcohol , pregnant unable comprehend study instruction .
